description: This file defines a singly linked list data structure with methods to add, remove, get elements, and determine the list size. It includes an inner Node class and a companion object with a helper method.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation with basic operations such as add, remove, size, and get by index.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Internal class representing a node in the linked list, holding data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at a specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Internal method to unlink a node from the list.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: Helper method to find the last node in the list.
